rules_text:
If a nontoken creature would die, exile it with an off-seer counter on it instead.
Whenever equipped creature attacks, remove an off-seer counter from target creature card in exile. If you do, create a tapped and attacking token that’s a copy of that card except it has base power 7. Sacrifice that token at the beginning of the next end step.
Equip {5}{R}{R}. This ability costs {1} less for each other legendary permanent you control.
notes:
2.1.0 I wanted to make lucky seven flashier and put more sevens on it. This design seems to fit the bill, though I might need to massage it later if recurring the same creature over and over feels to samey.
2.2.0: Made the exile a replacement effect and prevented looping the same creature. Also made the ability cost 1 more red.
